# EF236-232163: Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Services at Drummond Establishment

**Request for Proposal**

## Service Provision

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified proponents to submit their proposals for the provision of mechanical and electrical engineering services at the Drummond Institution in Drummondville, Quebec.

## Project Scope

The project involves the modernization of the heating and ventilation systems at the Drummond Institution. The selected contractor will be responsible for delivering the required engineering services, including design, procurement, and construction supervision.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3974101838
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3974101838
* **Publication Date:** May 4, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Technical Merit and Price

## Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by 2:00 PM EDT on June 29, 2023.
* Any bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive.
* A Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available online at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16176038?extsite=MTYxNzYwMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16176038?extsite=MTYxNzYwMzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* The Procurement Method is Competitive Open Bidding.
* The Procurement Category is Service.

## Contracting Entity and End User

* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* End User: Correctional Services of Canada (CSC)
